text: Niscaya tara kaphera, yara bale, masiha ibane mariyama'i allaha. Apani jijnesa karuna, yadi ta'i haya, tabe bala yadi allaha masiha ibane mariyama, tamra janani ebam bhumandale yara ache, tadera saba'ike dhbansa karate cana, tabe emana kara'o sadhya ache ki ye allahara kacha theke taderake bindumatra'o bamcate pare? Nabhomandala, bhumandala o etadubhayera madhye ya ache, sabakichura upara allaha taâ€™alara adhipatya. Tini ya iccha srsti karena. Allaha sabakichura upara saktimana.
